General.Name: Metsa Board Oyj B
General.Description: Metsä Board Oyj engages in folding boxboard, fresh fiber linerboard, and market pulp businesses. It provides barrier boards, food service boards, and white kraft liners. The company also offers lightweight paperboards for consumer goods and electronics, beauty care, cigarette, healthcare, beverage, food service, and graphical packaging applications. It serves brand owners, retailers, converters, corrugated box manufacturers, and merchants. The company was formerly known as M-real Corporation and changed its name to Metsä Board Oyj in March 2012. Metsä Board Oyj was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.
